org.gradoop.temporal.model.impl.operators.matching.common.query.postprocessing

Interface QueryTransformation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddTrivialConstraints, BoundsInference, MinMaxUnfolding, Normalization, Subsumption, SyntacticSubsumption, TemporalSubsumption, TrivialContradictions, TrivialTautologies

    public interface QueryTransformation
    Common interface for all query transformations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CNF transformCNF(CNF cnf)
      Applies a transformation on a CNF

    • Method Detail

      • transformCNF

        CNF transformCNF(CNF cnf)
          throws QueryContradictoryException
        Applies a transformation on a CNF
        Parameters:
        cnf - the CNF to transform
        Returns:
        transformed CNF
        Throws:
        QueryContradictoryException - if a contradiction in the query is encountered during the transformation
